summary: Well, the name says a lot, use wisely.
descriptionHtml:
I've tested this version and I think all the bugs are fixed or almost all of them. I'm with some college stuff to see so IF ANYONE CAN TEST THIS and send me a log with the results I'll be very appreciated.


Thanks.


Hey, if you still reading check out this: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49833/?; Kinda funny :3


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~Ladies and gentlemen there's the lastest version of the Ring of Invisibility now named The One Ring (people asked for it). Now you're always (truly always this time) invisible and should have no problem using it.
CREDITS:
THESE MESHES ARE A AWESOME MadNuttah WORK. I didn't make any of them, I found 'em here (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35920/?). As in MadNuttah post he said that anyone could se it, here I go.

P.S I don't like infinite files for download so if you have the old one download this new one.
I'll keep this way;
P.SÂ²: You're damn hard to detect when sneaking (believe)



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Version 0.3:
The Ring is now almost-fully functional with followers;
Invisibility visual cast effect (Like when you use the spell on yourself (the purple thing)) removed (it's just too annoying in battle and/or getting items);


Version 0.2:
-Minor bug fixes; (Every fancy log has it so mine does as well)
-Player is able to craft the ring now; (2 luna moth wings, 1 golden ingot and 1 sapphire)
-Player is ALWAYS invisible and if the effect is broken it will auto-restore;
Ok, now the ring is actually cool, try it! It won't harm (the complete opposite) :)
I'll try to let the player visible while in combat next version (game won't let me
author: Kernnunnos
